parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Similar to [[setMousePosition]] but relative to the given control.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[ctrlSetMousePosition]] [x, y]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> x: [[Number]] - Position in x

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> y: [[Number]] - Position in y

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetMousePosition]] [0.5, 0.5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMousePosition]]
</value></part></template></root>
